javadoc:
Interface to define methods to manage running tools and tools in
 the Tool Chest. The ToolManager also keeps track of the workspaces, and
 what tools are running in workspace, as well as the connections among tools
 across all workspaces.

methods.name: getConnection
methods.comment:
Get the connection object for the producer and consumer
 tools.

params.name: producer
params.comment: tool that is producing the tool event

params.name: consumer
params.comment: tool that is consuming the tool event

methods.javadoc:
Get a list of tools that produce at least one tool event.
@return zero-length array if no tool produces any events
methods.name: getProducerTools
methods.comment: Get a list of tools that produce at least one tool event.

return.comment: zero-length array if no tool produces any events

methods.javadoc:
Get a list of tools that consume at least one tool event.
@return zero-length array if no tool consumes any events
methods.name: getConsumerTools
methods.comment: Get a list of tools that consume at least one tool event.

return.comment: zero-length array if no tool consumes any events

methods.javadoc:
Get a list running tools across all workspaces.
@return zero-length array if there are no running tools.
methods.name: getRunningTools
methods.comment: Get a list running tools across all workspaces.

return.comment: zero-length array if there are no running tools.

methods.name: createWorkspace
methods.comment: Create a workspace with the given name.

throws.comment:
if a workspace with this
 name already exists.

methods.javadoc:
Remove the workspace.
@param ws workspace to remove
methods.name: removeWorkspace

methods.javadoc:
Get list of known workspaces.
@return an array of known workspaces
methods.name: getWorkspaces

methods.javadoc:
Get the active workspace
@return the active workspace
methods.name: getActiveWorkspace
addWorkspaceChangeListener
methods.comment:
Add the listener that will be notified when a tool is added
 or removed.

methods.javadoc:
Remove the workspace listener.
@param l workspace listener to remove
methods.name: removeWorkspaceChangeListener

methods.javadoc:
Removes all connections involving tool
@param tool tool for which to remove all connections
methods.name: disconnectTool

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool for which to remove all connections

methods.name: toolChanged
methods.comment:
A configuration change was made to the tool; a plugin was added
 or removed.

name: ToolManager
comment:
Interface to define methods to manage running tools and tools in
 the Tool Chest. The ToolManager also keeps track of the workspaces, and
 what tools are running in workspace, as well as the connections among tools
 across all workspaces.

fields.javadoc:
The name to use for a new unnamed workspace; used by the Ghidra
 Project Window when the user creates a new workspace.
fields.name: DEFAULT_WORKSPACE_NAME
fields.comment:
The name to use for a new unnamed workspace; used by the Ghidra
 Project Window when the user creates a new workspace.

fields.javadoc:
Property used when sending the change event when a workspace name is
 changed.
fields.name: WORKSPACE_NAME_PROPERTY
fields.comment:
Property used when sending the change event when a workspace name is
 changed.
